channel.title: Where's the purple hat in the Steam release??

item.title: Where's the purple hat in the Steam release??
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
To expand a bit further (warning, extreme spoilers):

After the resonance cascade, return to the lobby. Go outside to where you got off the tram (“Y’know, Barney’s been pretty scarce around these parts. Guess his bar tab finally caught up with him.”). Look at the entry door to the AM labs. Go to the left of the door. You will see some large pipes along the wall. Behind the pipes, there will be a small grate with the hat on it. I recommend quicksaving multiple times until you get it out of there; I died at least 8 times trying to get into and out of the area.

Enjoy!

Read full topic
item.source: Where's the purple hat in the Steam release??

item.title: Where's the purple hat in the Steam release??
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
It’s in UC, outside the airlock, you stay AM in. It’s hidden in the corner, in the dark, off the catwalk.

[sub][/sub]
[sub]Have fun.[/sub]
